*** Condições Gerais da Conta à Ordem***
Atualizámos as Condições Gerais da Conta à Ordem com entrada em vigor
a 1 de dezembro de 2024, nos capítulos A, B e D. Consulte as
alterações no final deste documento e o documento atualizado no site
do ActivoBank. O silêncio até à data de entrada em vigor das
alterações propostas considera-se aceitação. Caso não concorde com as
alterações propostas tem o direito de, imediatamente e sem encargos,
resolver o contrato antes da data de entrada em vigor para aplicação
das alterações.

As stated in the February statement, the
amendment to Section 4 will take effect on October 1st.
*** Current Account General Conditions***
The Current Account General Conditions have been updated, with the changes taking effect
on December 1, 2024, on chapters A, B, and D. Check
these changes at the end of this document and access the updated terms on
the ActivoBank website. If you remain silent until the changes take effect,
this will be considered acceptance. Should you disagree with the
proposed changes, you have the right to terminate the contract immediately
and free of charge prior to the effective
date.
***Card General Conditions***
The Card General Conditions have also been updated, effective December
1, 2024: updates to MB WAY transfer limits; removal of
paragraph i) from clause 44.1 and subsequent regrouping; correction in
clause 43.1.b). Review these changes at the end of this document and
